verses.verse: Now the divisions <WH4256> of the descendants <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> [were these: ] the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> [were] Nadab, <WH5070> Abihu, <WH30> Eleazar, <WH499> and Ithamar. <WH385>
But Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30> died <WH4191> before <WH6440> their father and had <WH1> no <WH1961> sons. <WH3808> So Eleazar <WH1121> and Ithamar <WH499> served <WH385> as priests. <WH3547>

And David, <WH1732> with Zadok <WH6659> of the sons <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> and Ahimelech <WH288> of the sons <WH1121> of Ithamar, <WH385> divided <WH2505> them according to their offices <WH6486> for their ministry. <WH5656>

Since more <WH7227> chief <WH7218> men <WH1397> were found <WH4672> from the descendants <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> than <WH4480> the descendants <WH1121> of Ithamar, <WH385> they divided <WH2505> them thus: [there were] sixteen <WH8337> <WH6240> heads <WH7218> of fathers' households <WH1004> of the descendants <WH1121> of Eleazar, <WH499> and eight <WH8083> of the descendants <WH1121> of Ithamar <WH385> according to their fathers' households. <WH1004>

Thus they were divided <WH2505> by lot, <WH1486> the one <WH428> as the other; <WH428> for they were officers <WH8269> of the sanctuary <WH6944> and officers <WH8269> of God, <WH430> both from the descendants <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> and the descendants <WH1121> of Ithamar. <WH385>

And Shemaiah, <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Nethanel <WH5417> the scribe, <WH9373> from the Levites, <WH3881> recorded <WH3789> them in the presence <WH6440> of the king, <WH4428> the princes, <WH8269> Zadok <WH6659> the priest, <WH3548> Ahimelech <WH288> the son <WH1121> of Abiathar, <WH54> and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers' [households] of the priests <WH3548> and of the Levites; <WH3881> one <WH259> father's household <WH1004> taken <WH270> for Eleazar <WH499> and one taken <WH270> for Ithamar. <WH385>
Now the first <WH7223> lot <WH1486> came <WH3318> out for Jehoiarib, <WH3080> the second <WH8145> for Jedaiah, <WH3048>
the third <WH7992> for Harim, <WH2766> the fourth <WH7243> for Seorim, <WH8188>
the fifth <WH2549> for Malchijah, <WH4441> the sixth <WH8345> for Mijamin, <WH4326>
the seventh <WH7637> for Hakkoz, <WH6976> the eighth <WH8066> for Abijah, <WH29>
the ninth <WH8671> for Jeshua, <WH3091> the tenth <WH6224> for Shecaniah, <WH7935>
the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> for Eliashib, <WH475> the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> for Jakim, <WH3356>
the thirteenth <WH7969> <WH6240> for Huppah, <WH2647> the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> for Jeshebeab, <WH3428>
the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> for Bilgah, <WH1083> the sixteenth <WH8337> <WH6240> for Immer, <WH564>
the seventeenth <WH7651> <WH6240> for Hezir, <WH2387> the eighteenth <WH8083> <WH6240> for Happizzez, <WH6483>
the nineteenth <WH8672> <WH6240> for Pethahiah, <WH6611> the twentieth <WH6242> for Jehezkel, <WH3168>
the twenty-first for Jachin, <WH3199> the twenty-second for Gamul, <WH1577>
the twenty-third for Delaiah, <WH1806> the twenty-fourth for Maaziah. <WH4590>

These <WH428> were their offices <WH6486> for their ministry, <WH5656> when [they] came <WH935> in to the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> according to the ordinance <WH4941> [given] to them through <WH3027> Aaron <WH175> their father, just <WH1> as the Lord <WH9201> God <WH3068> of Israel <WH430> had commanded <WH3478> him.
Now for the rest <WH3498> of the sons <WH1121> of Levi: <WH3878> of the sons <WH1121> of Amram, <WH6019> Shubael; <WH7619> of the sons <WH1121> of Shubael, <WH7619> Jehdeiah. <WH3165>
Of Rehabiah: <WH7345> of the sons <WH1121> of Rehabiah, <WH7345> Isshiah <WH3449> the first. <WH7218>
Of the Izharites, <WH3325> Shelomoth; <WH8013> of the sons <WH1121> of Shelomoth, <WH8013> Jahath. <WH3189>
And the sons <WH1121> [of Hebron: ] Jeriah <WH3404> [the first,] Amariah <WH568> the second, <WH8145> Jahaziel <WH3166> the third, <WH7992> Jekameam <WH3360> the fourth. <WH7243>
[Of] the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel, <WH5816> Micah; <WH4318> of the sons <WH1121> of Micah, <WH4318> Shamir. <WH9613>
The brother <WH251> of Micah, <WH4318> Isshiah; <WH3449> of the sons <WH1121> of Isshiah, <WH3449> Zechariah. <WH2148>
The sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> Mahli <WH4249> and Mushi; <WH4187> the sons <WH1121> of Jaaziah, <WH3269> Beno. <WH9057>
The sons <WH1121> of Merari: <WH4847> by Jaaziah <WH3269> [were] Beno, <WH9057> Shoham, <WH7719> Zaccur, <WH2139> and Ibri. <WH5681>
By Mahli: <WH4249> Eleazar, <WH499> who had <WH1961> no <WH3808> sons. <WH1121>
By Kish: <WH7027> the sons <WH1121> of Kish, <WH7027> Jerahmeel. <WH3396>

And the sons <WH1121> of Mushi: <WH4187> Mahli, <WH4249> Eder, <WH5740> and Jerimoth. <WH3406> These <WH428> [were] the sons <WH1121> of the Levites <WH3881> according to their fathers' households. <WH1004>

These <WH1992> also <WH1571> cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486> just <WH5980> as their relatives <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> in the presence <WH6440> of David <WH1732> the king, <WH4428> Zadok, <WH6659> Ahimelech, <WH288> and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers' [households] of the priests <WH3548> and of the Levites <WH3881> â€“ the head <WH7218> of fathers' [households] as well <WH5980> as those of his younger <WH6996> brother. <WH251>
